name: Realms of Midgard
overview: In this game you are a Galleon, which has to defend each city inside each realm. The way to stop the enemies will be to barrage cannon balls at them. Some good folk of each realm will try to send carts from farms - directly to the city. Others just try to invade it. Bad weather isn't good for the Galleon. That's one thing for sure. Released in the SEUCK Compo 2013 and published in Commodore Free #077.
